event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: The platform administrator should investigate the UPS.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: Problems have been detected with an external UPS.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
Problems have been detected with an external UPS.

The UPS failure may be due to:

   SCF software detecting that the external UPS has failed.
   External UPS encountering a low battery condition.

No immediate action is taken and nothing is deconfigured.

The platform administrator should investigate the UPS.



The recommended service action for this event is outlined in the steps below.

       LEGEND

      RED        = SUNW-MSG-ID
      BLUE     = EVENT_ID
      GREEN  = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Mar 27 15:28:37 nwk-dc2-1-sc0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: nwk-dc2-1  
   EVENT-ID: 28bb7d2f-6637-4824-8a1a-e33515a47efa
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8004-NA for detailed information.


   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID: SCF-8004-NA, TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Major
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 27 15:28:37 PDT 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: nwk-dc2-1, HOSTNAME: nwk-dc2-1-sc0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: 28bb7d2f-6637-4824-8a1a-e33515a47efa
   DESC: Problems have been detected with an external UPS.
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8004-NA for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: Nothing is deconfigured and no immediate action is taken.
   IMPACT: None.
   REC-ACTION: The platform administrator should investigate the UPS.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command

   
   SPARC Enterprise platform example:
 
   xscf> fmdump -v -u 28bb7d2f-6637-4824-8a1a-e33515a47efa

   TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
   Mar 27 15:28:37.1400 28bb7d2f-6637-4824-8a1a-e33515a47efa SCF-8004-NA
     100%  fault.chassis.env.power.ups

           Problem in: hc:///chassis=0
              Affects: -
                  FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=nwk-dc2-1:
                       server-id=nwk-dc2-1-sc0/component=CHASSIS



Step 3. Platform administrator should investigate the cause of the UPS failure.
        
           If unable to identify the cause of the UPS failure,
             then contact your Authorized Service Provider.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
response
event_registry_properties.item: Nothing is deconfigured and no immediate action is taken.
event_registry_properties.name: title
